channel.title: Issues with Whonix Workstation XFCE
channel.description: I have downloaded whonix gateway xfce and whonix workstation xfce, but i found two issues so far with whonix workstation: 1. Tor browser won't start. I tried to launch it from the start menu and by clicking on tor launcher file, but it won't start. 2. Ricochet won't connect to tor. It only shows 'connecting', but it won't connect.

item.title: Issues with Whonix Workstation XFCE
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
But i have problem installing Electrum. I am following the instruction from the official site and i am getting error that it needs newer python version - 3.6. How to install it?

Please start a separate topic for this. (after searching the forum to see if this has been discussed before)

Read full topic

item.title: Issues with Whonix Workstation XFCE
item.dc:creator: Simon707
item.description:
The Tor browser started working. I didn’t do anything, just restarted the workstation.
I followed the instructions and Ricochet is connection to tor. Actually, i got this issue before, but forget i need to do additional setup.
But i have problem installing Electrum. I am following the instruction from the official site and i am getting error that it needs newer python version - 3.6. How to install it?

Read full topic

item.title: Issues with Whonix Workstation XFCE
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Simon707:

Ricochet won’t connect to tor. It only shows ‘connecting’, but it won’t connect.

Further steps required, please see https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Chat#Ricochet_IM

Simon707:

Tor browser won’t start. I tried to launch it from the start menu and by clicking on tor launcher file, but it won’t start.

Please try start in debugging mode, see https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Browser#In_Debugging_Mode (click Expand)

Read full topic

item.title: Issues with Whonix Workstation XFCE
item.dc:creator: Simon707
item.description:
I have downloaded whonix gateway xfce and whonix workstation xfce, but i found two issues so far with whonix workstation:

  1. Tor browser won’t start. I tried to launch it from the start menu and by clicking on tor launcher file, but it won’t start.
  2. Ricochet won’t connect to tor. It only shows ‘connecting’, but it won’t connect.

Read full topic
